name: Deal Analyzer Workbook Messaging
description: Test messaging for the Deal Analyzer Workbook hero copy to ensure the free resource CTA aligns with investor expectations.

copy.subtitle: A proven underwriting workbook trusted by acquisition teams scaling their portfolios.
copy.description: Run the exact underwriting process Deal Scale uses internally. Prebuilt models, ROI calculators, and risk guardrails keep every acquisition disciplined.
copy.whatsInItForMe: Make faster go/no-go calls with the same diligence framework our team uses before writing an offer.
copy.target_audience: Real estate investors evaluating lookalike off-market deals with similarity feature overlays
copy.pain_point: You waste hours recreating underwriting models and second-guess the math on every deal.
copy.solution: Plug numbers into a guided workbook that handles the heavy analysis and surfaces the red flags instantly.
